import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; export default function Navbar() { const [isAuthenticated, setIsAuthenticated] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { // Check if token exists in localStorage const token = localStorage.getItem('token'); if (token) { setIsAuthenticated(true); // User is authenticated } }, []); return (
  • HOME
  • ABOUT
  • GALLERY
  • CONTACT
    • {/* Conditionally render the 'SIGN IN' or 'Your Donations' link */} {isAuthenticated ? (
  • YOUR DONATIONS
    • ) : (
  • SIGN IN
    • )}
); }
